text: Courcelles () is a municipality in the Belgian province of Hainaut. In 2007, 29724 people lived there. It is at 50° 27 North, 04° 21 East. File:Belgique - Hainaut - Souvret - Mines de charbon - 6 Perrier ou 6 Périer.png|" 6 Périer " Souvret == References == Category:Municipalities of Hainaut
title: Courcelles
